scripts.dev: npm run dev:prepare && nuxi dev playground
scripts.dev:prepare: nuxt-module-build build --stub && nuxt-module-build prepare && nuxi prepare playground
scripts.release:patch: npm run prepack && changelogen --bump patch --release && npm publish --access public && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run prepack && changelogen --bump minor --release && npm publish --access public && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: npm run prepack && changelogen --bump major --release && npm publish --access public && git push --follow-tags
